attributes.action: Give all World War 2 veterans an MBE for the sacrifice they made to this country
attributes.background: Having read the recent Queens Birthday Honours list, it is clear that all World War 2 veterans are far more deserving to receive an honour than many of the current awardees.  This country should honour all our veterans who put the Great into Great Britain.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
